body.section: This project provides infrastructure to build the user interface of a rich client. It allows you to build powerful and complex clients using a clean and well documented API that can be build as HTML5 web-client, native Swing client, etc. To get started have a look at our technical architecture and read the JavaDoc. mmm-client-ui is separated in two sub-layers mmm-client-ui-widget and mmm-client-ui-dialog.
